data.technical_notes: Implemented stateful express-session authentication with rolling expiry for 30min inactivity timeout to satisfy non-functional requirements; passwords hashed with bcrypt (no plain text per constraints); seeded exact admin (admin@test.com / Password123!) and 5 sample employees as per NFR-001; role-based redirects and access checks ensure AC3 and AC4; static HTML with Tailwind per STYLE-001; all db operations Promise-wrapped for async/await; GDPR noted via hashing and session security (httpOnly cookie).

data.description: Create package.json with all dependencies including express for server, sqlite3 for database, bcrypt for password hashing, express-session for stateful sessions with inactivity timeout, dotenv for environment config (per NFR-001 patterns)

Create package.json with all dependencies including express for server, sqlite3 for database, bcrypt for password hashing, express-session for stateful sessions with inactivity timeout, dotenv for environment config (per NFR-001 patterns)
Install Node.js dependencies to set up the project environment
Install Node.js dependencies to set up the project environment
Create .env file with configuration: PORT=3000, DB_PATH=./data.sqlite, SESSION_SECRET=fallback-secret-do-not-use-in-prod (for session timeout after 30min inactivity via rolling cookie)
Create .env file with configuration

Create src/db.js with createDb factory to open SQLite database, initDb to create users table (id, name, email UNIQUE, password_hash, role, start_date) if not exists, seed exactly 1 admin user (per NFR-001: admin@test.com / Password123! hashed with bcrypt, role='hr', name='Admin', start_date='2023-01-01') and 5 sample employees (emp1@company.com to emp5@company.com / Password123! hashed, role='employee', names 'Employee 1' to 'Employee 5', start_date='2023-01-01') if table empty, and getUserByEmail function using Promise-wrapped sqlite3 callbacks (per conventions: async/await compatibility); use await bcrypt.hash(password, 10) for hashing in seed

Create src/db.js with createDb factory to open SQLite database, initDb to create users table (id, name, email UNIQUE, password_hash, role, start_date) if not exists, seed exactly 1 admin user (per NFR-001

Create public/login.html based on provided wireframe using Tailwind CDN with defined colors (#3B82F6 primary, #6B7280 neutral), update form action='/login' method='POST', add JS to check URL query param 'error' and show/unhide #error div with 'Invalid email or password.' message if present (per AC: 'Invalid login shows error'; per STYLE-001 dependencies for styling)

Create public/login.html based on provided wireframe using Tailwind CDN with defined colors (#3B82F6 primary, #6B7280 neutral), update form action='/login' method='POST', add JS to check URL query param 'error' and show/unhide #error div with 'Invalid email or password.' message if present (per AC

Create public/hr-dashboard.html with Tailwind styling per STYLE-001 (bg-white, sans-serif), content:

HR Dashboard

Role-based features for HR (per AC: 'Role determines visible features')

Logout (per AC: 'Logout clears session')
Create public/hr-dashboard.html with Tailwind styling per STYLE-001 (bg-white, sans-serif), content

Create public/employee-dashboard.html with Tailwind styling per STYLE-001 (bg-white, sans-serif), content:

Employee Dashboard

Personal features for employees (per AC: 'Role determines visible features')

Logout (per AC: 'Logout clears session')
Create public/employee-dashboard.html with Tailwind styling per STYLE-001 (bg-white, sans-serif), content

Create src/server.js as main Express app: require modules (express, session, path, dotenv, db functions); load .env; configure app.use(express.urlencoded({extended:true})); configure express-session with rolling cookie for 30min inactivity timeout (per non-functional: 'Session timeout after 30min inactivity'); create authMiddleware to check req.session.user exists and redirect to /login.html if not; add POST /login route with try/catch: validate request body (1) check email/password exist, (2) trim strings, (3) get user via getUserByEmail, (4) await bcrypt.compare(password, user.password_hash), if valid set req.session.user={id, role} and redirect to /hr-dashboard if role='hr' else /employee-dashboard (per AC: 'Valid credentials grant access; Role determines visible features'), else redirect /login.html?error=invalid (per AC: 'Invalid login shows error'); add GET /logout to destroy session and redirect /login.html (per AC: 'Logout clears session'); add GET /hr-dashboard with authMiddleware, check role==='hr' else redirect /login.html, then res.sendFile public/hr-dashboard.html; add GET /employee-dashboard with authMiddleware, check role==='employee' else redirect /login.html, then res.sendFile public/employee-dashboard.html; add app.use(express.static('public')) for serving login.html; initialize db = createDb(process.env.DB_PATH), await initDb(db) on startup; export app, conditionally app.listen(3000) if run directly (per NFR-001: single port 3000, static files served, async/await with try/catch)
Create src/server.js as main Express app
